Text.Name: Talk_WuDang
Text.Hate.0: Alright. So, what're you here for?
Text.Normal.0: You can buy anything you want if the price is good enough.
Text.Like.0: Here you are. What do you want to purchase this time?
Text.Submiss.0: We have a rare visitor! Please excuse us for any disrespect.
Text.GiftLike.0: Thanks! This is exactly what I want.
Text.LowValueGift.0: Why are you giving me this?
